title: RIOT fix your main problems before u keep adding skins and other stuff in game
body:
RIOT keeps bringing new stuff in game which is not bad the game needs some new stuff and I agree with that, but what s the point in having hundred of skins and many champions when they don t fix the main issues?
People who leave the game after they fed like crazy, you report them and barely see any instant feedback, the matching system is quite poor. 
Also RIOT expects you to stay calm when a 12 years old kid starts to flame at you and he doesn t stop he keeps pushing ur nerves, but ye you must stay calm and don t react back  because if you say something back it s possible both to get a penalty.

Another issue is about  balance there are some champions like Janna and twitch with crazy win rates for a long time now and they don t tweak anything to lower their win rate a bit or make it possible to deal better with them.
There are serious problems in game at the moment and they re real, fix those problems 1 st then bring  all the crazy stuff with runes and masteries in one thing or ip turned into blue essence and new skins. These problems are important not the lack of limited skins and stuff.

replies.body:
Why are people upvoting this? It reeks of ignorance.

1. Different teams are handling balance, player behaviour and skins. Just because they work in the same company doesn't mean they can do everything.
2. Riot can do very little about players being assholes. It's like this in nearly every online game (especially visible in team-based competetive ones). 

I understand what you are trying to say, but it just doesn't work like this. The problems listed by you are real, but slowing down on skins etc. would not hasten solving those problem.

You do realize there are different teams in riot that do different things.

What does the skin making team have anything to do with the balance team, and why would riot as a whole stop their skins team from doing their job when that's how the company makes money? 



And as far as the 12 year old constantly flaming you, stop being thin skinned, if you're actually getting your feelings hurt because some kid is talking random stuff out his ass then you honestly don't need to be on any multiplayer games anyways lol
ah but there you are mistaken, this is riot, financed by tencent, they could wipe their ass with 1000 dollar bills and not notice a difference in money
well yes there are different teams but there is a total budget limit, resources spend on one team will mean that resources is not going in to another team.
